General.Name: Cotec Construction JSC
General.Description: Coteccons Construction Joint Stock Company provides designing and construction services in Vietnam. It is involved in equipment installation, interior decoration, and office leasing related activities. The company engages in real estate trading and brokerage, as well as trades in building materials. In addition, it repairs, installs, leases, and sells machinery, equipment, and spare parts. Further, the company engages in renting of energy machinery and heating equipment for solar energy. Coteccons Construction Joint Stock Company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
